title: BRIEF-M III Acquisition Announces New Meeting Date For Meeting Of Stockholders To Approve Proposed Business Combination With IEA Energy Services Llc
text: Market News March 12, 2018 / 11:50 AM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-M III Acquisition Announces New Meeting Date For Meeting Of Stockholders To Approve Proposed Business Combination With IEA Energy Services Llc Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 12 (Reuters) - M Iii Acquisition Corp: * M III ACQUISITION CORP. ANNOUNCES NEW MEETING DATE FOR THE SPECIAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS TO APPROVE PROPOSED BUSINESS COMBINATION WITH IEA ENERGY SERVICES LLC * M III ACQUISITION CORP - SPECIAL MEETING HAS BEEN RESCHEDULED TO MARCH 15, 2018, AT 10:00 A.M., EASTERN TIME Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
